info.title: User Management API
info.summary: Express Application demonstrating the `express-typescript-deocorators` for managing users
info.description: Fully functional Express Application developed with Typescript focused on `express`, `sequelize-typescript` and `express-typescript-decorators`.  Contains examples of key API components including an Express Router, referred to as a Controller, Sequelize model, a database migration, authentication middleware and `winston` logging.
